# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/simple-oauth2`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for simple-oauth2 (https://github.com/lelylan/simple-oauth2).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/simple-oauth2/v4.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 25 Sep 2023 13:39:06 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: none
